mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, NVL(USER_PWD, '') USER_PWD, NVL(USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL, NVL(STATUS, 'N') STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, STATUS, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{status}, SYSDATE)
